snippet: Forced out of office in August amid allegations of sexual harassment, Mr. Filner pleaded guilty to a charge of false imprisonment, among others.
abstract: Bob Filner, former San Diego mayor forced out of office in a storm of sexual harassment allegations, pleads guilty to a series of false imprisonment and battery charges involving three women.

byline.original: By ROB DAVIS and ADAM NAGOURNEY
byline.contributor: Rob Davis reported from San Diego, and Adam Nagourney from Los Angeles.

lead_paragraph: Forced out of office in August amid allegations of sexual harassment, Mr. Filner pleaded guilty to a charge of false imprisonment, among others.

headline.main: Ex-Mayor of San Diego Pleads Guilty to Charges of Sexual Harassment
headline.print_headline: Ex-Mayor of San Diego Pleads Guilty to Charges of Sexual Harassment
